entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Flurries at times heavy beginning near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
